EmailTemplate.subject: Oubliez tout ce que vous savez sur les feuillets!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-unique-uses-for-sticky-notes.aspx?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBERBLOG19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Le chouchou de tous, ce produit essentiel de bureau a de nombreuses utilités surprenantes! Apprenez-en plus sur ses utilisations astucieuses. Utilisations astucieuses des feuillets autocollants <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-unique-uses-for-sticky-notes.aspx?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBERBLOG19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
